content.question: In the Mosque of Selim II, the architect Sinan proclaimed the Ottoman sultan’s supremacy over the emperors of Byzantium through all of the following means EXCEPT by

choices.label: creating a central space that surpassed that of Hagia Sophia
building on the site of Emperor Justinian’s tomb
locating the mosque on the tallest hill overlooking the city
adapting the central plan to meet the requirements of Islamic religious practices

content.answer: building on the site of Emperor Justinian’s tomb
